EmailTemplate.description: Welcome notification sent to new Channel Partner
EmailTemplate.name: Communities: Channel Partner Welcome Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to the Honeywell Channel Partner Community
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
From: Honeywell Channel Partner Community
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName} {!Receiving_User.LastName},
Welcome to the Honeywell Channel Partner Community. This tool was developed to help our channel partners track and action the leads they receive from Honeywell.
To create your account and view the leads assigned to you, please go to: {!Community_Url}.
For additional training on how to use the tool, please contact your Honeywell channel marketing manager or view the following video tutorials:
1. English
2. Spanish
3. Portuguese
Thank you for your time.
The Honeywell Channel Marketing Team
